item.description:
The Westboro Baptist Church, which regularly pickets organizations and groups that they perceive to be pro-gay, as well as picketing soldiers' funerals, will be in the area for a few days. Boston University students are organizing a counter-protest (details here) as well as a non-confrontational love picnic at the same location. Members of the BA might want to show their support by participating.

We plan to meet at the grassy area on the corner of Bay State Road and Granby Street.

For more info about the Westboro Baptist Church:
http://en.wikipedia.o...

The Westboro circus has a listing of their area protests at http://www.godhatesfa... for your convenience, they are:

12/01/2009 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM
Dorchester, MA: University of Massachusetts
"Thank God For AIDS, stupid!"
100 William T Morrissey Blvd

12/01/2009 12:50 PM - 1:20 PM
Boston, MA: The Jewish Advocate
"Pretending Fags Didn't get it from U?!"
15 School St

12/01/2009 2:35 PM - 3:10 PM
Brookline, MA: Brookline High School
"Obama's legacy: No Jobs, food, money"
115 Greenough St

12/01/2009 3:30 PM - 4:00 PM
Boston, MA: Boston University Hillel
"Hillel was a pervert, so are U"
213 Bay State Rd

12/01/2009 6:45 PM - 7:30 PM
Boston, MA: Temple Israel
"Why is that Barney Fag talking here?!"
477 Longwood Avenue

12/02/2009 08:30 AM - 09:00 AM
Boston, MA: Cathedral of the Holy Cross
"Priests Rape Children U Know?"
75 Union Park St.

12/02/2009 11:15 AM - 12:00 PM
Boston, MA: Genesis Forum XIV
"Ethics and Jews, talk about opposites!"
126 High Street
item.name: Westboro Baptist Church Protest
